situation: P frequently leaned on his classmates' desks during math lessons, disturbing their concentration.
action: The teacher aide set clear visual boundaries on the floor using colorful tape and privately explained to P the importance of respecting others' spaces. Engaged P in a role-play exercise to practice maintaining personal space.
effect: P was able to better visualize personal space boundaries and showed significant improvement in respecting others' areas, resulting in a calmer classroom environment.
